Package p4_group_8_repo.controller

Class HighScoreSceneController

java.lang.Object
p4_group_8_repo.controller.HighScoreSceneController
All Implemented Interfaces:
HighScoreControllerAbstractFactory
public class HighScoreSceneController
extends Object
implements HighScoreControllerAbstractFactory
A controller that handles all event within the High Score Scene.
Author:
Liew Yih Seng

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    HighScores highScores
    Always gets the Main.getHighScore() to ensure the list of high score this class is working on is the updated version of the high score list.
    javafx.scene.control.Label[] level
    An array of labels that hold the most current levels of high score achiever.
    javafx.scene.control.Label[] name
    An array of labels that hold the most current names of high score achiever.
    SceneController scene
    Represents the SceneController in this class.
    javafx.scene.control.Label[] score
    An array of labels that hold the most current scores of high score achiever.

  • Constructor Details

    • HighScoreSceneController

      public HighScoreSceneController​(SceneController scene)
      A constructor that sets this scene to the SceneController.scene initialized in SceneController class.
      Parameters:
      scene - A SceneController that represents SceneController to be passed into this class.

  • Method Details

    • backMenu

      public void backMenu​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent event) throws Exception
      A method that allows user to go back to the Menu Scene or the Pause Scene depending whether the user is in game or not by using the method User.isInGame(). If a true has been returned, it will invoke the method SceneController.activate(String) to activate and display the Pause Scene. If it returns false, it will activate and displays the MenuScene.
      Specified by:
      backMenu in interface HighScoreControllerAbstractFactory
      Parameters:
      event - A MouseEvent that represents if the user has clicked on this button.
      Throws:
      Exception - If the source is null.

    • setScoreText

      public void setScoreText()
      A method the sets the high score list into the most updated version of the list. It will update every element within the array name, level and score.
      Specified by:
      setScoreText in interface HighScoreControllerAbstractFactory
